DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effectiveness Cognitive Therapy Acceptance Commitment Therapy randomize control trial among patient Major Depressive Disorder routine clinical practice . Furthermore , study investigate whether specific treatment approach mediate proposed theoretical mechanism .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptance Commitment Therapy Versus Cognitive Therapy Treatment Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The current study aim investigate effectiveness Cognitive Therapy Acceptance Commitment Therapy randomize control trial among patient MDD routine clinical practice . Further , study investigate whether specific treatment approach mediate proposed theoretical mechanism . Patients meet diagnostic criterion nonpsychotic MDD determine Structured Interview DSM-IV . Each client receive either Cognitive Therapy Acceptance Commitment Therapy last 16 20 session . Based previous result , expect treatment form prove beneficial patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Meeting DSMIV criterion MDD 2 . Between age 18 65yearsold 3 . Having sufficient fluency Dutch complete treatment research protocol 1 . DSMIV criterion bipolar disorder ( past present ) 2 . Psychotic disorder 3 . Substance dependence disorder ( current within past 6 month ) , 4 . Organic brain syndrome . 5 . Borderline antisocial personality disorder
